name: Gloopy & Gloob
description:
Gloopy & Gloob have been separated by evil scientists and forced to perform tests to reconnect. Guide them through the puzzles using their unique ability to split themselves and merge back together!

Select the slimes with left click and right click to send selected slimes to specified location.

Made for Iowa State Game Development Club 2023 Spring game jam.

Credits:

John - Code & Music

Lev- Art
